title: Add Metrics Drilldown visualization to a dashboard

blocks.content: Dashboards help you create a curated set of visualizations that you can reference for ongoing monitoring.
On the toolbar at the top of the Explore page, click **Add > Add to dashboard**.

On the **Add panel to dashboard** dialog box:

- To add to a new dashboard, click **New dashboard**
- To add to an existing dashboard, click **Existing dashboard** and select from the list
Click **Save dashboard** located in the upper-right of the page.
Enter a title and description for your dashboard, select a folder if applicable, and click **Save**.
